English
When you get into trouble there's only one person to call, Olivia Pope.
Olivia is a professional 'fixer' who makes problems go away before anyone
even knows they exist. For the moneyed, the powerful and even the President,
Olivia is a legend in her field. Her spectacular success is mostly due to her
unbreakable rule of always trust your gut. No matter how careful you are,
when you do damage control for a living, you're bound to cause some damage to
your own life. She and her crew eat, sleep, live and breathe crisis. Each
week, as the team races against the clock to defuse intriguing new problems
before they become full-blown disasters, they also have to deal with their own
personal issues. They may call themselves 'gladiators in suits', but little by
little, Olivia and her crew begin to reveal the chinks in their armor.
